artist: Toyohara Kunichika; Publisher: Izutsuya Shōkichi; Carver: Katada Chōjirō
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
life_date: Toyohara Kunichika, Japanese, 1835–1900; Izutsuya Shōkichi, Publisher, Japanese, c. 1849–1865; Katada Chōjirō, Carver, Japanese
markings: on each sheet: combined date and censor seal: 亥三改 {i san aratame} (Boar 3 inspected); on left sheet: 彫長 {Hori Chô}; on right sheet: 片田彫長 {Katada hori Chô}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
signed: on left sheet, in toshidama cartouche: {Kunichika ga} 国周画; on center sheet: 国周画 {Kunichika ga}; on right sheet, in toshidama cartouche: 一鴬斎国周画 {Ichiōsai Kunichika ga}
title: Procession Crossing over a Pontoon Bridge on the Fifty-three Stations of the Tōkaidō Road
